dcterms:description: The dataset contains COVID-19 case data from the Instituto Carlos III de Madrid, which is considered the most reliable data for Spain available at the moment. It includes the total number of reported cases obtained as the sum of the results of different types of tests, and it is used to analyze the cumulative incidence over 14 days.
dcterms:title: Instituto Carlos III de Madrid COVID-19 Data

dcterms:description: This dataset is available on GitHub and contains COVID-19 data collected by various contributors. It is used for analysis and modeling of COVID-19 spread.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 Data from GitHub (datadista)

dcterms:description: This dataset is available on GitHub and contains COVID-19 data collected by the Italian Civil Guard. It is used for analysis and modeling of COVID-19 spread in Italy.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 Data from GitHub (Italian Civil Guard)

dcterms:creator: D. Giuliani
M. M. Dickson
G. Espa
F. Santi
dcterms:description: This dataset provides modeling and prediction of the spread of COVID-19 infection in three Italian regions, contributing to the understanding of the disease dynamics.
dcterms:title: COVID-19 Data from Giuliani et al. (2020)
